logentry.author: peikeng
logentry.msg: -- MyExplorer - Coding -- #17832 Subscribe/Unsubscribe channel/topic takes a while to load and no loading icon #17349 The number of Subscribers of some channels shows incorrectly #17292 Unsubscribed channels/topics still show even though the list is refreshed #17281 Search result shows incorrectly #17780 Missing "Create Post" in my channels in ipad #17964 No need to show alert view for these APIs when it returns error

logentry.author: peikeng
logentry.msg: -- MyExplorer - Coding -- #17539 Blank account is displayed when tagging invalid account #17414 Show Back button to back to previous screen when in opening file screen #17349 The number of Subscribers of some channels shows incorrectly #17340 myExplorer is crashed on ipad when clicking on any channels/topics in By Channels/By Topics tab in Feed #17267 Should show loading icon when searching channels/posts #17281 Search result shows incorrectly #17303 Tutorial card is displayed when first login and select an open channel to subscribe #17302 User search's loading icon during tagging #17308 Favourite/Like post takes a while to load and no loading icon #17292 Unsubscribed channels/topics still show even though the list is refreshed #17593 myExplorer app is crashed when trying to refresh "By Channels" list #17312 Total view and Published Date of some posts show incorrectly #17415 1 file is downloaded when downloading multiple files #17642 List of post of its channel is appeared in About tab when user try to send/cancel email to channel's email #17624 Old posts are displayed on top #17630 Content in description is move up and down and then disappear when tagging multiple account #17654 Show error message and Search in domain when no record found #17650 Missing service desk Phone number; Email; Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions on Ipad
